room_title: Escape room "The Antidote" by Portsmouth Team Building - Escape Rooms in Portsmouth
room_description:
Professor Phineas Watchtower from the year 1875 invented device to travel through time. His wife, Elisabeth, is ill and the cure is in the lab where you stand. Help find the cure, start up the time travel device and send the antidote back to him in the past.
The time portal closes in 1 hour.
